STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. OSCAR MELENDEZ Alice Osedach-Powers, assistant public defender, in support of the petition. *952Frederick W. Fawcett, supervisory assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided February 19, 2003

KATZ, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
